content: --रंगः {1} good colour. {2} the orange. {3} a hole cut in a house (सुरंगा also in this sense). (--गं {1} red sanders. {2} vermilion.

सुरंगः --गा {@--1@} A hole cut in a wall for the purpose of breaking into a house. {@--2@} A subterranean passage, a mine dug underneath a building; ऐकागारिकेण तावतीं सुरंगां कारयित्वा <ls>Dk.</ls>, सुरंगया बहिरपगतेषु युष्मासु <ls>Mu. 2</ls>; (written also सुरुंगा).
